parts.01: When starting Cornival Conduct you will be given 500 coins to start you verry owne carnival. click on one of the buildable squares and create your first stand. You will have a selection of 3 types to chose from. Attractions: the best for attracting visitors but produce the least revenue. Prize Stall: average at generating both visitors and coins. Confectionary: which attract the least visitors but generate the highest coins.
parts.02: Once you have chosen you firs Stand it will begin to generate coins and visitors. Click on your stand to see how its doing. Stands have a built in coins maximum which they will reach, make sure to check in regularaly to cash in your coins and move them into your total coins. Stands also have a maintenance value wich will decrease over time and reduce the ammout of coins and visitors that this stand generates. You can pay from your total coins to fix your stand or leave it untill you wish to pay to fix it. Be carful with maintenance as a ride will shut down when it reaches 0%.
parts.03: The game lasts for 10 minutes. Run your carnival; build some Stands to generate more coins to build more Stands and try attract and many visitors as possible before the time is up.
